scenes.description: Shiori is in a dark library-like environment, where she finds a mysterious bookmark and reads a message from the Nyakuzas.
Shiori travels through a portal and arrives at a rainy castle garden.
Shiori performs the song 'Rainy Boots' in the garden.

subtitles.original: What's this?
subtitles.english: What's this?

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Oh, wow!
subtitles.english: Oh, wow!

subtitles.original: Oh...
subtitles.english: Oh...

subtitles.original: Hang on, there's a cue card I'm supposed to read.
subtitles.english: Hang on, there's a cue card I'm supposed to read.

subtitles.original: Well, hopefully this one's a good one.
subtitles.english: Well, hopefully this one's a good one.

subtitles.original: Okay, well... it says,
subtitles.english: Okay, well... it says,

subtitles.original: “Don't worry Shiori, while your power will continue to grow...”
subtitles.english: “Don't worry Shiori, while your power will continue to grow...”

subtitles.original: “...and your journey will take you to realities as of yet unbeknownst to humanity...”
subtitles.english: “...and your journey will take you to realities as of yet unbeknownst to humanity...”

subtitles.original: “...as long as you have my bookmark, you will be protected.”
subtitles.english: “...as long as you have my bookmark, you will be protected.”

subtitles.original: “Please use it as your link to the past and your guide to the future.”
subtitles.english: “Please use it as your link to the past and your guide to the future.”

subtitles.original: Mmm.
subtitles.english: Mmm.

subtitles.original: Hey, I didn't see that card earlier.
subtitles.english: Hey, I didn't see that card earlier.

subtitles.original: And whose bookmark is that? Where was it?
subtitles.english: And whose bookmark is that? Where was it?

subtitles.original: I don't know!
subtitles.english: I don't know!

subtitles.original: I just looked away and then when I looked back, suddenly it was there in front of me.
subtitles.english: I just looked away and then when I looked back, suddenly it was there in front of me.

subtitles.original: But what do I do with this?
subtitles.english: But what do I do with this?

subtitles.original: I think the Nyakuzas want you to put the bookmark in the archway.
subtitles.english: I think the Nyakuzas want you to put the bookmark in the archway.

subtitles.original: Ah!
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: Maybe like... like this?
subtitles.english: Maybe like... like this?

subtitles.original: Oh! It worked!
subtitles.english: Oh! It worked!

subtitles.original: The Nyakuzas say that thanks to the bookmark, the portal's been opened permanently.
subtitles.english: The Nyakuzas say that thanks to the bookmark, the portal's been opened permanently.

subtitles.original: You can go back home, but the 3D world will stay available to you.
subtitles.english: You can go back home, but the 3D world will stay available to you.

subtitles.original: They want you to know that this reality is so much bigger than just this one place.
subtitles.english: They want you to know that this reality is so much bigger than just this one place.

subtitles.original: There's a lot to see and archive here.
subtitles.english: There's a lot to see and archive here.

subtitles.original: And when you're done with this reality, there are even more places for you to explore.
subtitles.english: And when you're done with this reality, there are even more places for you to explore.

subtitles.original: It looks like your character arc is just beginning.
subtitles.english: It looks like your character arc is just beginning.

subtitles.original: But don't worry, whenever you need us, we'll be here to help, Shiori.
subtitles.english: But don't worry, whenever you need us, we'll be here to help, Shiori.

subtitles.original: Alright!
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: Whoa!
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: See ya suckers!
subtitles.english: See ya suckers!

subtitles.original: Bye Shiori! See ya!
subtitles.english: Bye Shiori! See ya!

subtitles.original: レイニーブーツ
subtitles.english: Rainy Boots

subtitles.original: レイニーブーツ 代わりに溺れて
subtitles.english: Rainy boots, drowning instead

subtitles.original: 行けないところまで哀しみを弾くだけ
subtitles.english: Just repelling sadness to a place I can't go

subtitles.original: レイニーブーツ 跳ねた言葉を
subtitles.english: Rainy boots, words that splashed

subtitles.original: 踏み締めた音に乗って 心まで踊りたいの
subtitles.english: Riding the sound I stepped on, I want my heart to dance

subtitles.original: 雨上がり哀しいにおいの街
subtitles.english: A city with a sad smell after the rain

subtitles.original: 雲をかきわけたお日様が
subtitles.english: The sun that pushed through the clouds

subtitles.original: 眠気交じりで溜まった涙を見ている
subtitles.english: Is watching the accumulated tears with a sleepy gaze

subtitles.original: 雨上がり正しい通り道
subtitles.english: The correct path after the rain

subtitles.original: 足元は湿って危ないわ
subtitles.english: It's wet and dangerous underfoot

subtitles.original: ぬかるみにハマらないよう注意して
subtitles.english: Be careful not to get stuck in the mud

subtitles.original: お気に入りの靴の身代わりになって
subtitles.english: Sacrificing my favorite shoes

subtitles.original: あなたの言葉を弾いてみせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll repel your words

subtitles.original: 遅れたバスに乗りたくないなら
subtitles.english: If you don't want to get on the late bus

subtitles.original: 溜まった涙が跳ねる音のリズムに乗って行け
subtitles.english: Go along with the rhythm of splashing tears

subtitles.original: レイニーブーツ 代わりに溺れて
subtitles.english: Rainy boots, drowning instead

subtitles.original: 行けないところまで哀しみを弾くだけ
subtitles.english: Just repelling sadness to a place I can't go

subtitles.original: レイニーブーツ 跳ねた言葉を
subtitles.english: Rainy boots, words that splashed

subtitles.original: 踏み締めた音が鳴って 心まで無敵
subtitles.english: The sound I stepped on rings out, my heart is invincible

subtitles.original: ジャンプ ジャンプ なんて出来ない
subtitles.english: I can't jump, jump

subtitles.original: 地球にいじわるされて捕まれているの
subtitles.english: The Earth is being mean and holding me back

subtitles.original: ステップ ステップ ちょっとむずい
subtitles.english: Step, step, it's a bit hard

subtitles.original: 雨の中転ばぬように静かに踊るの
subtitles.english: Dancing quietly so as not to fall in the rain

subtitles.original: 雨上がり水溜まった道
subtitles.english: The road is puddled after the rain

subtitles.original: どんだけ深く沈んでいける？
subtitles.english: How deep can I sink?

subtitles.original: 降ったり止んだり忙しないね
subtitles.english: It's restless with rain falling and stopping

subtitles.original: 履かなくても大丈夫な人もいるけど
subtitles.english: Some people are fine without wearing them, though

subtitles.original: 梅雨の救世主になって
subtitles.english: Become the savior of the rainy season

subtitles.original: あなたの言葉で遊んでみせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll show you how I play with your words

subtitles.original: 満員電車は曇ってやばいから
subtitles.english: The crowded train is foggy and awful

subtitles.original: 溜まった涙が跳ねる音のリズムに乗ろう
subtitles.english: Let's ride the rhythm of the sound of splashing tears

subtitles.original: レイニーブーツ 代わりに溺れて
subtitles.english: Rainy boots, drowning instead

subtitles.original: 見えないところまで哀しみを弾くだけ
subtitles.english: Just repelling sadness to an invisible place

subtitles.original: レイニーブーツ 跳ねた言葉を
subtitles.english: Rainy boots, words that splashed

subtitles.original: 踏み締めた音に乗って 心まで踊りたい
subtitles.english: Riding the sound I stepped on, I want my heart to dance

subtitles.original: ジャンプ ジャンプ なんて出来ない
subtitles.english: I can't jump, jump

subtitles.original: この先道悪い慣れてるあたしに任せて
subtitles.english: The road ahead is bad, leave it to me who's used to it

subtitles.original: ステップ ステップ ちょっとむずい
subtitles.english: Step, step, it's a bit hard

subtitles.original: 雨の中汚れぬように静かに歌うの
subtitles.english: Singing quietly so as not to get dirty in the rain
